title: Indian banks' body to seek easing of proposed norms for retail deposits, sources say
description: The Indian Banks' Association is asking the Reserve Bank of India to reduce the proposed additional 5% 'runoff' requirement on retail deposits and to implement it gradually. They also seek an extension for providing feedback. The regulation aims to boost liquidity resilience, potentially increasing demand for government bonds.
